title: Mortal Kombat 1-4 ENG PC (Big Pack)
description:
Mortal Kombat 1-4 eng PC (GOGv2.0.0.2+MAME+Ultimate MK3+Trilogy+Arcade Kollection+MK4GOLD)

Mortal Kombat (1-3) GOGv2.0.0.2.rar - DOS-version.
Hot keys ALT+p = Pause. ALT+q = Quit. F10 = Setup (menu). 
F1 = Select Player 1. F2 = Select Player 2.
Esc in MK3.

MAME Mortal Kombat Arcade Kollection.zip - arcade versions MK1,MK2,MK3,UMK3 (MAME32plus!plus! - kaillera)
Mortal Kombat (rev 5.0), Mortal Kombat II (rev L3.1),
Mortal Kombat 3 (rev 2.1), Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (rev 1.2)
Hot key in game F1

Mortal Kombat Arcade Kollection (2012) - MK1,MK2,UMK3.
* Use any serial to install the game.
* Use any existing local/online  Games  for  Windows  Live 
profile or create a new local profile to play. 

Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (E)(Saturn).rar - Sega Saturn (emulator yabause-0.9.14-win64).
Open emultor yabause.exe, Add BIOS (in same folder), file/openISO Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (E).cue 
(same folder)

Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (Genesis).rar - Sega Genesis (emulator Gens v2.14)
Open emulator gens.exe, file/Open ROM, Sega Genesis Games/Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3.smd
(same folder)

Mortal Kombat Trilogy PC.rar - sometimes need patch MKT Patch 1.zip or mkt vista patch.zip
For music Mortal Kombat Trilogy original CD (mount for music).nrg disk letter must be D.

Mortal Kombat Trilogy Greatest Hits Edition PS1.rar - PS1 (emulator ePSXev1.7.0)
Open ePSXe.exe, file/runISO, Games PS1/Mortal Kombat Trilogy Greatest Hits Edition PS1/ 
(same folder)

Mortal Kombat 4 PC full.rar - run  Mortal Kombat 4 PC.exe.
For music mount Mortal Kombat 4.img disk letter must be D.
Hot keys F1 in game.

Mortal Kombat 4 Gold - Dreamcast (emulator nullDC_104_r136)
Open nullDC_Win32_Release-NoTrace.exe, file/normal boot, Sega Dreamcast Games/mortal kombat gold.CDI
